title: Budget 2026: ITR Filing Deadlines Extended for Revised Returns and Staggered Deadlines Introduced
content:
# Budget 2026: ITR Filing Deadlines Extended for Revised Returns and Staggered Deadlines Introduced

Ek important update hai! Government ne Income Tax Return (ITR) filing deadlines extend ki hain for revised returns aur kuch specific taxpayers ke liye staggered deadlines bhi announce ki hain, as part of post-Budget 2026 announcements.

Here are the key details:

*   **Extended Deadline for Revised Returns (AY 2025-26):** Taxpayers ab apni revised returns financial year 2024-25 (Assessment Year 2025-26) ke liye 31st March 2026 tak file kar sakte hain.
    *   **Old Due Date (Revised Returns AY 2025-26):** 31st December 2025
    *   **New Due Date (Revised Returns AY 2025-26):** 31st March 2026
*   **Staggered Deadlines for Certain Taxpayers (AY 2026-27):** For Assessment Year 2026-27 (Financial Year 2025-26), certain categories of taxpayers, primarily those whose accounts require audit, will now have staggered deadlines.
    *   **Old Due Date (Audit Cases AY 2026-27):** 31st October 2026
    *   **New Due Date (Audit Cases AY 2026-27):** 30th November 2026
*   These extensions aim to provide taxpayers with more time and ease the compliance burden, especially in light of the new provisions introduced in Budget 2026. This move will help ensure accurate and timely filing.
*   The announcement was made via **Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) Notification No. 16/2026, dated February 3, 2026**.
